sql-statement.sql:
from sys_log where 1=1 <% if(!isEmpty(user_uuid)){ %> and user_uuid like #'%$user_uuid$%'# <% } %>
<% if(!isEmpty(op_type)){ %> and op_type like #'%$op_type$%'# <% } %>
<% if(!isEmpty(startdate_start)){ %> and s.startdate >= to_timestamp(#$startdate_start$#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') <% } %>
<% if(!isEmpty(startdate_end)){ %> and s.startdate <= to_timestamp(#'$startdate_end$'#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') <% } %>
